issue.title: [R] More undefined global functions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16071](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16071). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
```Java

* checking R code for possible problems ... NOTE
rename_with.ArrowTabular: no visible global function definition for
  'select'
rename_with.ArrowTabular: no visible global function definition for
  'rename'
rename_with.Dataset: no visible global function definition for 'select'
rename_with.Dataset: no visible global function definition for 'rename'
rename_with.RecordBatchReader: no visible global function definition
  for 'select'
rename_with.RecordBatchReader: no visible global function definition
  for 'rename'
rename_with.arrow_dplyr_query: no visible global function definition
  for 'select'
rename_with.arrow_dplyr_query: no visible global function definition
  for 'rename'
Undefined global functions or variables:
  rename select
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16071?focusedCommentId=17518119) by Nicola Crane (thisisnic):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12784
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12784>
